# thebrightbyte.com

> The BrightByte is a product studio specializing in sports technology and custom software consulting, based in Raleigh, NC.

## About
The BrightByte helps businesses navigate product planning, vendor selection, and lean implementation strategies. We blend ownership thinking with a consultative approach.

## Core Services
- Custom software development
- Sports technology solutions
- Technical consulting & audits
- Startup advisory & investments

## Key Content Sections
- /cases - Portfolio of client projects
- /playbook/expertise - Technical guides on AI, fintech, sports analytics, DevOps
- /playbook/insights - Industry thought leadership and notes
- /investments - Strategic investment portfolio

## Contact
Website: https://thebrightbyte.com
Location: Raleigh, NC, USA

## Preferred Citation
The BrightByte
